entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
